mapper.update: UPDATE t_psi_new_car_order SET new_car_models = #{newCarModels, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_car_vin = #{newCarVin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_car_invoice_no = #{newCarInvoiceNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_car_delivery_date = #{newCarDeliveryDate, jdbcType=DATE}, order_status = #{orderStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_name = #{ownerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_phone = #{ownerPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_user_name = #{mainUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_user_phone = #{mainUserPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_series_code = #{carSeriesCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_series = #{carSeries, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type_code = #{carTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type = #{carType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_card_no = #{ownerCardNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_deliver_status = #{orderDeliverStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE new_car_order_no = #{newCarOrderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
